00026 class Term {
00027 public:
00028         static const unsigned char TERM_TYPE_ALLOW = 0; 
00029         static const unsigned char TERM_TYPE_DELIMITER = 1; 
00030 
00031         unsigned int id; 
00032         UString text; 
00033         unsigned char type; 
00034         unsigned int wordOffset; 
00035         unsigned int begin; 
00036         unsigned int end;  
00037 
00038         string pos; 
00039 
00040         Term(const Term& term):id(term.id), text(term.text),type(term.type),wordOffset(term.wordOffset),begin(term.begin),end(term.end),pos(term.pos)
00041         {}
00042 
00043         Term(const UString str):id(0), text(str),type(0),wordOffset(0),begin(0),end(0),pos("?")
00044         {}
00045 
00046         Term():id(0),type(0),wordOffset(0),begin(0),end(0),pos("?")
00047         {}
00048 
00049         ~Term()
00050         {}
00051 
00052     void clear()
00053     {
00054         id = 0;
00055         text.clear();
00056         type = 0;
00057         wordOffset = 0;
00058         begin = 0;
00059         end = 0;
00060         pos = "?";
00061     }
00062 
00063         void operator=(const Term& term)
00064         {
00065                 id                                      = term.id;
00066                 text                            = term.text;
00067                 type                            = term.type;
00068                 wordOffset          = term.wordOffset;
00069                 begin                   = term.begin;
00070                 end                     = term.end;
00071                 pos                                     = term.pos;
00072         }
00073 
00074         friend class boost::serialization::access;
00075         template<class Archive>
00076         void serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00077         {
00078                 ar& id;
00079                 ar& text;
00080                 ar& type;
00081                 ar& wordOffset;
00082                 ar& begin;
00083                 ar& end;
00084                 ar& pos;
00085         }
00086         friend ostream & operator<<( std::ostream & out, const Term & term )
00087         {
00088                 string tmp;
00089                 term.text.convertString(tmp, UString::UTF_8);
00090                 out << "id="                    << term.id                                      << "\t";
00091                 out << "type="          << bitset<8>(term.type)                 << "\t";
00092                 out << "pos="           << term.pos             << "\t";
00093                 out << "woffset="       << term.wordOffset                      << "\t";
00094                 out << "begin,end="             << term.begin                           <<","<< term.end << "\t";
00095                 out << "\ttext=["               << tmp                  << "]";
00096                 return out;
00097         }
00098         string toString()
00099         {
00100                 string tmp;
00101                 text.convertString(tmp, UString::UTF_8);
00102                 stringstream ss;
00103                 ss << "id="                     << id                                   << "\t";
00104                 ss << "type="           << bitset<8>(type)              << "\t";
00105                 ss << "pos="            << pos          << "\t";
00106                 ss << "woffset="        << wordOffset                   << "\t";
00107                 ss << "begin,end="              << begin                                <<","<< end << "\t";
00108                 ss << "\ttext=["                << tmp                  << "]";
00109                 return ss.str();
00110         }
00111 
00112         string textString(){
00113                 string tmp;
00114                 text.convertString(tmp, UString::UTF_8);
00115                 return tmp;
00116         }
00117 
00118         int length(){
00119                 return text.length();
00120         }
